UniProt Entry.description: The amino acid sequence of the current peptide coincides with the amino acid sequence of the UniProt entry.

Literature.Title: Exploring the antibacterial potential of Lactococcus lactis subsp. lactis bv. diacetylactis BGBU1-4 by genome mining, bacteriocin gene overexpression, and chemical protein synthesis of lactolisterin BU variants.
Literature.Author: Malesevic M, Gardijan L, Miljkovic M, O'Connor PM, Mirkovic N, Jovcic B, Cotter PD, Jovanovic G, Kojic M

Sequence Information.Target Organism: Lactococcus lactis subsp. lactis BGMN1-596(MIC=81.33±18.04µg/ml),Listeria monocytogenes ATCC 19111(MIC=130±14.14µg/ml),Staphylococcus aureus ATCC 25923(MIC=94.67±28.38µg/ml)
